Cash aid distribution problematic in Metro Manila, says DILG s Año tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737036 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737036/cash-aid-distribution-problematic-in-metro-manila-says-dilg-s-ano/story/ "Among other LGUs, NCR lang talaga 'yung malaking problema kasi kanila 'yung pinakamaraming families, beneficiaries. In other LGUs, okay naman," Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said. "[In] Metro Manila, we still have a lot of areas here na mahirap ibigay without actually sacrificing the physical distancing," he added. Wed, 06 May 2020 10:25:35 +0800
